attributes.action: Increase the legal age for having sex from 16 to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel to protect children the age for sexual intercourse should be increased to 18 from 16.
This is to include heterosexuals, homosexuals and lesbians.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
